headerDisplay: This plugin works with webOS based TV and are exposed to HomeKit as separate accessories and each needs to be manually paired.

getInputsFromDevice.title: Load Inputs From Device
getInputsFromDevice.description: This function get all available inputs and apps direct from device, manually configured inputs will be skipped.

disableLoadDefaultInputs.title: Disable Load Default Inputs
disableLoadDefaultInputs.description: This function disable load default inputs Live TV, HDMI 1, HDMI 2 in to the inputs list.

filterSystemApps.title: Hide System Apps
filterSystemApps.description: If enabled, all System Apps will not be displayed on the list of inputs.

inputsDisplayOrder.title: Inputs Display Order
inputsDisplayOrder.description: Here select display order of the inputs list.

reference.title: Reference
reference.description: Here set the Input/App, Channel reference.

reference.title: Reference
reference.description: Here set the Input/App or Channel reference.

command.title: RC Command
command.description: Here select the remote control command.

displayType.title: Display Type
displayType.description: Here select display type in HomeKit app.

namePrefix.title: Prefix
namePrefix.description: Here enable/disable the accessory name as a prefix for button name.

sensorPower.title: Power
sensorPower.description: This expose Power as a Motion Sensor to use with automations, fired if Power ON.

sensorPixelRefresh.title: Pixel Refresh
sensorPixelRefresh.description: This expose Pixel Refresh as a Motion Sensor to use with automations, fired if PixelRefresh ON.

sensorVolume.title: Volume
sensorVolume.description: This expose Volume as a Motion Sensor to use with automations, fired on every Volume change.

sensorMute.title: Mute
sensorMute.description: This expose Mute as a Motion Sensor to use with automations, fired if Mute ON.

sensorInput.title: Input
sensorInput.description: This expose Input as a Motion Sensor to use with automations, fired on every Input change.

sensorChannel.title: Channel
sensorChannel.description: This expose Channel as a Motion Sensor to use with automations, fired on every Input change.

sensorSoundMode.title: Sound Mode
sensorSoundMode.description: This expose Sound Mode as a Motion Sensor to use with automations, fired on every Sound Mode change, webOS >= 6.0.

sensorSoundOutput.title: Sound Output
sensorSoundOutput.description: This expose Sound Output as a Motion Sensor to use with automations, fired on every Sound Output change.

sensorPictureMode.title: Picture Mode
sensorPictureMode.description: This expose Picture Mode as a Motion Sensor to use with automations, fired on every Picture Mode change, webOS >= 4.0.

sensorScreenOnOff.title: Screen Off
sensorScreenOnOff.description: This expose Screen ON/OFF as a Motion Sensor to use with automations, fired if Screen Off, webOS >= 4.0.

sensorScreenSaver.title: Screen Saver
sensorScreenSaver.description: This expose Screen Saver as a Motion Sensor to use with automations, fired if Screen Saver ON, webOS >= 4.0.

items.title: Inputs
items.description: Here create Input/App Sensors based on reference, sensor will active if switch to it.

displayType.title: Type
displayType.description: Here select sensor type to be exposed in HomeKit app.

namePrefix.title: Prefix
namePrefix.description: Here enable/disable the accessory name as a prefix for sensor name.

turnScreenOnOff.title: Turn Screen ON/OFF
turnScreenOnOff.description: This enable possibility turn screen ON/OFF, webOS >= 4.0.

turnScreenSaverOnOff.title: Turn Screen Saver ON/OFF
turnScreenSaverOnOff.description: This enable possibility turn screen saver ON/OFF, webOS >= 4.0.

brightnessControl.title: Brightness
brightnessControl.description: This enable possibility adjust the Brightness.

backlightControl.title: Backlight
backlightControl.description: This enable possibility adjust the Backlight.

contrastControl.title: Contrast
contrastControl.description: This enable possibility adjust the Contrast.

colorControl.title: Color
colorControl.description: This enable possibility adjust the Color.

pictureModeControl.title: Picture Modes
pictureModeControl.description: This enable possibility change the Picture Mode, webOS >= 4.0.

name.title: Name
name.description: Here set Your own Picture Mode name.

displayType.title: Display Type
displayType.description: Here select display type in HomeKit app.

namePrefix.title: Prefix
namePrefix.description: Here enable/disable the accessory name as a prefix for picture mode.

volumeControl.title: Volume
volumeControl.description: Here select what a volume control mode You want to use. If select *None/Disabled* only hardware buttons in RC app can be used to control volume.

soundModeControl.title: Sound Modes
soundModeControl.description: This enable possibility change the Sound Mode, only for webOS >= 6.0.

name.title: Name
name.description: Here set Your own Sound Mode name.

displayType.title: Display Type
displayType.description: Here select display type in HomeKit app.

namePrefix.title: Prefix
namePrefix.description: Here enable/disable the accessory name as a prefix for sound mode.

soundOutputControl.title: Sound Output
soundOutputControl.description: This enable possibility change the Sound Output.

name.title: Name
name.description: Here set Your own Sound Output name.

displayType.title: Display Type
displayType.description: Here select display type in HomeKit app.

namePrefix.title: Prefix
namePrefix.description: Here enable/disable the accessory name as a prefix for sound output.

serviceMenu.title: Service Menu
serviceMenu.description: This enable access to the service menu from input list.

ezAdjustMenu.title: EZ Adjust Menu
ezAdjustMenu.description: This enable access to the ez adjust menu from input list.

disableLogInfo.title: Disable Log Info
disableLogInfo.description: This disable logging values and states on every it change.

disableLogDeviceInfo.title: Disable Log Device Info
disableLogDeviceInfo.description: This disable log device info by every connections device to the network.

disableTvService.title: Disable TV Service
disableTvService.description: This disable TV service and prevent display double services if TV already support HomeKit native.

sslWebSocket.title: SSL WebSocket
sslWebSocket.description: This enable SSL WebSocket, support TV with new firmware.

infoButtonCommand.title: Info Button
infoButtonCommand.description: Here select the function of info button in RC.

restFulDebug.title: Debug
restFulDebug.description: This enable debug mode for RESTFul.

restFulPort.title: Port
restFulPort.description: Here set the listening Port for RESTful server, every device need own port.

mqttDebug.title: Debug
mqttDebug.description: This enable debug mode for MQTT.

mqttHost.title: IP/Hostname
mqttHost.description: Here set the IP/Hostname of MQTT Broker.

mqttPort.title: Port
mqttPort.description: Here set the port of MQTT Broker.

mqttClientId.title: Client ID
mqttClientId.description: Here optional set the Client ID of MQTT Broker.

mqttAuth.title: Authorization
mqttAuth.description: This enable authorization for MQTT Broker.

mqttUser.title: User
mqttUser.description: Here set the user of MQTT Broker.

mqttPasswd.title: Password
mqttPasswd.description: Here set the password of MQTT Broker.
